name: Scatterbrian
description:
This game was made by one person in one week for the first Callom Uptons game jam, without any prior experience making games.

Credits to:

R2-VE aka Redd for the Voiceacting and some Gametesting

 drotzruhn for the famale humming

InspectorJ for the menu hoverover sound

this game uses Assets from the UE marketplace

only packed for windows 64 bit.
